reviews.review_text: Bin 4 Burger Lounge (2996 Granville St., Vancouver) I recently had the pleasure of dining at Bin 4 Burger Lounge located on Granville Street in Vancouver, and I must say that it was a delightful experience. This trendy and cozy restaurant specializes in crafting gourmet burgers with a unique twist, and it certainly lived up to its reputation. First and foremost, the ambiance of Bin 4 Burger Lounge was inviting and contemporary. The interior was tastefully decorated with a combination of rustic and modern elements, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The seating arrangements were comfortable, and the staff was attentive and friendly, providing prompt service throughout my visit. Now lets talk about the star of the show the burgers. Bin 4 Burger Lounge offers an extensive selection of burgers, each with its own distinct flavor profile. From classic beef burgers to inventive vegetarian options, there is something to satisfy every palate. I opted for their signature Bin 4 Burger, and it did not disappoint. The patty was juicy, perfectly cooked, and seasoned to perfection. The toppings were fresh, and the brioche bun was soft and complemented the burger beautifully. The portion sizes were generous, ensuring that I left feeling completely satisfied. In addition to their impressive burger menu, Bin 4 Burger Lounge also offers a variety of tasty sides and appetizers. Their truffle Parmesan fries were a standout, with a delightful combination of flavors that elevated the dining experience. The restaurant also boasts a selection of craft beers and cocktails to complement the meal, adding another layer of enjoyment. While the overall dining experience at Bin 4 Burger Lounge was excellent, there were a few minor areas where improvements could be made. Firstly, the wait times during peak hours can be a bit long, so its advisable to make a reservation or plan your visit accordingly. Secondly, the pricing is slightly on the higher side, especially when considering the add-ons and sides. However, the quality of the ingredients and the exceptional flavors justify the price to a large extent. In conclusion, Bin 4 Burger Lounge is a must-visit spot for burger enthusiasts in Vancouver. With its inviting atmosphere, flavorful burgers, and attentive service, it delivers a memorable dining experience. While it may be a bit pricey, the quality and taste of the food make it worth the investment. I will definitely be returning to Bin 4 Burger Lounge for another mouthwatering burger adventure in the future. Our server was Jessi, and he is very friendly and his service was superb. Parking: It s on the back side of the restaurant

My friend told me about Bin 4 Burger Lounge a while back but I didnt get the chance to go until today. The service and cocktails are great. The burger I ordered was amazing. I love how it looked exactly how it did in the picture. It was also a huge burger that I was able to eat only half of it and had to take the rest home. I ordered the Lob It To Me Burger which had lobster, goat cheese and truffle aioli. It was delicious. Im definitely bringing my family here next time.
Wow burgers are great Love the options for sides... Dipping sauce is mmmmmgood Zero alcohol drinks tasted great too Quick customer service and food was well presented

I tried the Bison Burner burger, and it was absolutely delicious. The burger was juicy, full of flavor, and accompanied by a sweet and spicy jalapeno salsa/jam. However, the fries were not crispy and were a bit too soft and soggy for my taste. They offer a variety of burgers made from chicken, vegan, beef, fish, and bison, with numerous flavors to choose from, and the overall quality of the food was excellent. The seating was comfortable, making it a great place to hang out. They offer a fantastic late-night special after 9 pm, where you can order any burger with fries or salad for only $11, along with a non-alcoholic drink. Excellent servive by the servers.

Wonderful place to grab a burger. The burgers are delicious, juicy and very well seasoned. There is an incredible selection of different combinations to customize your burger. Fries are excellent, crispy and tasty. Service is good. The restaurant is modern and inviting. A small patio outdoor is available.

What a great Burger place! I ve never been before and wish I have. Many burgers and sides to choose from. Taylor was the best! Her vibe is unreal and she s so caring and helpful. I only spoke briefly with a few others there but everyone was so nice. They have a great selection of drinks as well. Will be back, cheers!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Chad! So glad to here.

reviews.review_text: Came here for the 50% off burgers after 9 pm with any drink purchase. Got the big dipper, decent burger, however its difficult to differentiate if its Wagyu or not, but nonetheless a good burger. I would like to say they have great sauces so go try them out when you get the chance. Surprisingly, my favourite thing I had there was the strawberry goat cheese salad, it was probably the best tasting thing in my opinion that came as an upgrade side to the burger.

I recently visited Bin 4 Burger Lounge and tried their famous Bin 4 Burger along with a side salad. I have to say, it was one of the best burgers Ive ever had! The Bin 4 Burger is made with a juicy, perfectly cooked beef patty that was seasoned to perfection. The burger was topped with crispy bacon, melted cheddar cheese, fresh avocado, and a tangy aioli sauce. The combination of flavors and textures was outstanding - every bite was bursting with deliciousness. Overall, I would highly recommend Bin 4 Burger Lounge for anyone looking for a delicious and satisfying meal. The quality of the food and the attention to detail in the flavors and presentation were truly impressive.

Best burgers in town! We loved the ambience, the service. We ordered wild mushroom burger and big spenny  which is a wagyu burger and both were amazing. We loved the big spenny better though. Will definitely go back.
Great meals, good prices and lovely staff. The burgers were very well prepared. Will be back for sure.

Absolutely love this place!  Went here for lunch, and there was plenty of seating indoors and outdoors.  I had the Big Spenny burger (Brant Lake Wagyu patty) with smoked bacon, orange cheddar, lettuce, tomato and a side of house fries.  The burger was outstanding and definitely filled me up.  Also highly recommend the sriracha cilantro aioli dip for the fries.

Great spot for burgers and drinks. Their happy hour menu is such a great deal. They have many sides you can choose from along with sauces so extremely customizable. Drinks are also excellent. And they have gluten free buns which is an additional plus.
We ordered Ginger Soy Tofu burger and garlic truffle fries, and we did not regret ordering it. Great service, amazing atmosphere and delicious food.

my friends and i have been coming here at least once a week for around a year now, and the food never disappoints! we always are excited to come and know that we are going to enjoy our food. all of the servers are consistently awesome and kind to us. we truly love coming here. but we are sad to hear that the house made chips will no longer be offered. it might seem small, but the chips Bin 4 offered complimentary to every table was always one of the most looked-forward to parts of our meal. there are few restaurants in vancouver that offer anything complimentary (those that do usually just bread), and the chips were something that set bin-4 apart. of course, rising costs affect all restaurants and we understand why the change occurred, but we are all truly disheartened. otherwise the restaurant is awesome and i recommend it to everyone that wants a good burger.
We been here many times - live close by Always good service / delicious food / price very reasonable Great place to hang out with friends Food : 5/5

Ive been recommended by lots of people to check this place out and I am so glad that I did. The service and atmosphere were fantastic. The individual who helped us was patient and friendly and even made great recommendations for our meals. The food was delicious. I really enjoyed the burger and poutine, but I was surprised with how good the fried pickles were. I cant wait to go back and try out their other menu options.

Ratings Scale 0 - 10 Variety: 8 Service or Product: 8 Customer Service: 8 Environment: 8 Cleaning: 8 Cost: 7 Loved the burgers here, thankfully the beef is Halal. The patty was fresh and juicy! They had a cozy little patio seating while the indoor dining area is closed. Staff was friendly and accommodating to my dietary requirements, However I got a surprise $1 ir 2 added due to the extra sauce I had requested and was not told it was extra :)

Chicken lettuce burger, bison burger and a tofu wild mushroom burger with very delicious fries ordered half and half with a blue cheese, praline salad made for three amazing meals, we each enjoyed. Very popular place. Vegetarian options: You can replace virtually any meat option with tofu, bean or beyond meat type burgers.

It takes a little longer to prepare the order as they are  always busy with lots of customers. The taste of the food is fantastic and peoples are so kind and friendly  I love mushrooms burgers a lot. Try it! Will not be regret  I asked them even make the sandwich with lettuce rapped instead of using bunny bread

This is my 3rd visit and I ve always walked away with a (very) full belly. Courtesy potato chips, crispy fries, options to get both salad and fries, a lot of decent burger choices, nice dips this place is overall very nice for small parties or just a meal. The only cons I d say is that food is a little on the salty side, but that s because I don t pair any alcohol with it.
First time being here recommend by one of my friends, the beef patty is amazing. It tastes better than Dawg House Grill in Ruston, Louisiana. In addition, the appetizer, Tuna, is a must try!

Half off burger with purchase of a drink after 9pm? Awesome deal. After trying out the burger, regular price isnt too bad either. I tried the wild mushroom, definitely loaded with mushrooms and Swiss cheese on top was fabulous. Fries were good too. Cant wait to try their other burgers. Only thing is that the AC is on full blast, gets a little chilly even with the heat outside, or because we went for the after 9pm special, it was cooler and so the AC was too high at that time.

Absolutely loved this place. First time coming here and they had dine out Vancouver going on. The bruschetta was delicious it comes with planko crusted goat cheese, I ll be adding pictures so that makes sense. I got the bistro which is a chicken burger, it is pretty sweet, I had to take some of the onions out, but it was delicious. The service was amazing, the food was delicious. Can t wait to go back and try something else.

Ambience   / Food           / Service       / They are halal friendly. Have chicken and beef halal burgers. They will let you know about their halal burgers and what items they wont add to keep everything halal. 50% OFF for nightly orders after 9PM

In short, a great lounge with delicious burgers. The decors are contemporary and offers good vibs for either just food or a date with drinks. Its a lounge so the food doesnt come up that fast like a fast food place. I would say things are a little more pricey than a normal burger place because this is more up scale. But again, you get great food and atmosphere here for the price. Parking: Its on a busy street, so parking is limited to a few street side spots and parking lots on the smaller streets around the block.

Update Apr 2022 Absolutely amazing food. If youre craving a burger this is definitely the place to be. They have a wide range on the menu and therell be something that will for sure catch your eye. The kitchen is very efficient and very quick at getting your food out. However, this place does get busy in the evenings and weekends so budget your time. They have a very well priced menu. Old: The burgers are really good. The fries are okey nothing special. The onion rings are not so good, they do use red onions for the onion rings but it does not improve the flavor. Service was good again nothing special. After we fined our meals and paid the bill my friend and I wanted another beer but the server was no where to be found.

Lovely restaurant, ambiance and room is wonderful.  Nice quite spot off the bustle of Granville.  Excellent service, attentive and friendly.  The dine out Vancouver menu is excellent.  Starters were lovely and fresh, burgers delicious and each with their own unique flavor and the truffles for desert a very fine and tasty end to a great meal.

Bust burger ever, the minted lamb was amazing, and the basil aioli dip was great with the home cut fries, fried pickles. The truffle burger is a must try for truffle lover. The burger is really juicy and tasty. I would suggest adding dill to fried pickles so there would be a difference between the batter used for Onion ring and the batter for the pickles. That was just an opinion. All in all this restaurant is a gem and the experience and service are fabulous. Did I mention the happy hour?

Bin 4 has some great burgers. The burgers here arent so typical, they play around and try to create interesting flavors. I didnt get to try just a normal burger here, so I have no idea how they stack up for a purist, but the burgers we tried were really great. I tried the Minted Lamb burger and it was so delicious. The blue cheese stood out, but the eggplant and tomato relish brought some great sweetness that combined so well with the lamb. I would eat this burger again in a heart beat. My dining mates had the Big Dipper (a play on a beef dip, but with a burger) and the Bistro (a chicken, brie and bacon burger). Both were well received! Bin 4 lets you have your choice of aioli for dipping (normally for fries, but theyll still give it to you with a salad!) and it was so fun to try them out. Also, the happy hour is incredible. All their single cocktails are 5$, so we each tried one and Id love to come again and try more. Sorry for the unimpressive photos! It was very bright out and hard to get them to be not overexposed.

As a regular customer of Bin 4 Burger Lounge, I cant help but sing praises for this exceptional establishment, and I must give a special shoutout to Terra and Michelle for consistently providing outstanding service. They never fail to impress with their warmth, attentiveness, and dedication to ensuring that every visit is memorable. Terra and Michelles unwavering commitment to ensuring a fantastic dining experience has made me a devoted regular, and I eagerly anticipate each return visit to savor their warm hospitality and delectable burgers!

This place is amazing. The burger is in my top 3 Ive ever had (I think). We got recommended to this place and it did not disappoint. You get to choose your sides and your dipping sauce. The burgers are juicy, full of toppings and delicious. 10 out of 10 recommend coming here.
Very delicious and fulfilling burgers and overall great taste. Tuna tataki was delish. Service was a bit slow and they were a bit busy,  good idea to make Reservations in advance.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words. We appreciate the feedback!

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the burgers at this place; they are incredibly delicious! If you plan to visit, dont forget to book a table in advance because it tends to get crowded. You wouldnt want to miss out on this fantastic dining experience!

Went back, had the mushroom burger with side off huge juicy onion rings. So good. Great food and service every time. For all the vegetarians out there, U can order any burger on the menu with grilled tofu.

The food was good, wasn t like the best I ve ever tasted but it was good. Bit loud tho because of cars. Service was great and prices are reasonable. Would recommend if ur looking for a good burger place. Parking: If you want u can go park like a block away, or see if u can find parking in front. tho I recommend just walking here if it s close to ur house. Kid-friendliness: Kids menu and drinks, plus crayons and little games for them to play. It s pretty average.

Love the gluten free options. Had the Spenny burger and it is the best burger I ve had in Vancouver so far! The fries are celiac safe! Also love the Soma Apple Cider. Huge menu. Staff are super friendly. Dietary restrictions: I have celiac and dairy sensitivity. They are very knowledgeable about restrictions.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! So glad you enjoyed!

reviews.review_text: Probably my favourite burger joint. For those who are health conscious and are looking for something not so grand and greasy, this is a more upscale burger diner that focuses on local quality ingredients. From feature halibut burgers to an expansive range of bison, wagyu beef, local range beef, chicken, bean, lentil, tofu burgers.. the list goes on. Lots of customization and selection for visitors who seek a unique burger experience. As for my rating of the food, everyone at my table loved what they got and almost everyone got something different. We are not afraid to speak up and give an honest opinion if something falls short in any area and there was none of that. Highly recommend to try at least once.
Love the food BUT! Our server make us love this place!! Kerryn was so amazing, super nice, kind and giving you the best service that was really hard to find nowadays.

We had the mushroom burger and their classic Bin 4 burger with a fried egg. The mushroom burger was the best out of the two and found that one of the burgers was over cooked and too dry, but perhaps that was a one-off as the other was cooked perfectly. Highly recommend the strawberry and goat cheese salad. They were able to cut the burgers in half so we could share as well.

This was my favourite burger place when I was living in Victoria, but now I m in Langley, it s a little ways to get to one. It was busy when we got there at 5:30pm, I wasn t aware that they are running happy hours on a Saturday evening. Reservation highly recommended. Service was awesome, food was even better. Still one of the best burger place around Greater Vancouver.

Best Burger place in Vancouver for me!! Burger was beautiful and tasty, the Patio had heater and was comfortable, server was pretty good, you can choose side food and dip for burger plate.Overall I enjoyed the experience in this place. I wanna visit again!
First time visiting here and felt very satisfied with the big portion. The burger and fries were so good that I finished them up on my own. Will definitely come back.

Had a delicious chicken burger with brie cheese and bacon, and an even better, fabulous drink (cranberry apple sangria). Waiter was really friendly  and even brought over a piece of cake for my nieces  30th birthday Food
Came here with my gf for late night deal and she loved it. The beer tasted good and the burgers were perfect. The onion rings were crispy and huge. Salad tasted really good too. Highly recommend

bin 4 late night is the best time to satisfy your burger craving. Do have to be ready for a bit of wait for seating and food. Its best hectic on a good day. Food is top notch. Able to replace veggie patty with any burger of your choice
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your support & feedback!

reviews.review_text: Bin 4 Burger Lounge provides you with food made with high quality ingredients. We went there thinking its your generic fancy burger joint. It turned out to be an excellent experience. The waitress that helped us was incredibly informative and informed us to understand their menu and how their specials rotate monthly.

Never get disappointed with burgers here. My favourite is Chicken of the sea but today I tried the September burger  so deer to me  and didn t regret about it. The only little thing was the fried onion was burned so it was a bit bitter. The waitress was very lovely and thoughtful. It took a while for the food came but it wasn t a big problem.

We enjoyed the Big Spenny and Big Dipper burgers on Bin 4 s patio yesterday. Both the burgers were flavourful and delicious. I would recommend trying deep fried pickles as sides. We had lime berry sangria and Helios golden lager for drinks. The sangria was not just refreshing but grog to look at too! All in all, a great burger lounge to chill on a summer evening

Got to experience a little  Tay Tay Magic  at Bin 4 Burger. Taylor S. is freaking awesome! She made great recommendations, and one of them she made herself (apple cider lum rum cocktail)! Bin 4 sauce is the bomb for dipping fries! (Photo of food taken after already eating fries  couldn t wait!)

Great burgers and french fries I really recommend Big Dipper and wild mushroom burger Late night offer is amazing, you can have a delicious burger only with 11CAD which is served with french fries Recommended dishes Big Dipper Burger, Wild Mushroom Burger with Half Fries and Salad
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, glad you enjoyed!

reviews.review_text: The Bistro Chicken burger, add Avocado, was the best chicken burger Ive ever had. The perfect balance of salty and sweet. The fries were delish with the garlic aioli. Everyone at our table loved their food. Portions were also great for the price. My only complaint is the deep fried Pickles, not my favourite spice but the chicken burger made up for it.

We had the breakfast club burger and it was amazing! The bison/pork/chorizo Pattie was perfectly seasoned and moist. All the toppings complemented eachother and to finish it off the fries were fluffy yet crispy. 10/10 Definately need to come back to try more of their burgers
Sat outside on patio for happy hour. Great service . Discounts on food and alcohol. Inside was busy and noisy. Good restroom. Discount for patrons attending the Stanley theatre. Will go again. Food

Spontaneous choice results in one of the best burgers I have ever eaten! Normally when we eat out, we review the place we go in order to get the value out of quantity, quality, service and atmosphere. Bin 4 Burger Lounge did not disappoint, despite being a spontaneous choice with little if any review. We were greeted by a friendly staff and sat down on their patio, where a brief review of the specials and happy hour drinks, which was followed by what was included in the regular menu choices and what was extras or up-scaling. After receiving our drinks and complementary home made chips (or crisps) we ordered a Black and Blue burger with their fires and a Wild Mushroom with up-scaled onion rings, both of which came with our choice of aioli dipping sauce. The Black & Blue with the jalapeno aioli sauce was juicy and topped with fresh tomato and arugula as well as a small mound of sweet red onion relish. All the flavours were distinct and complementary, with each of the described ingredients tasting fresh. The fries, as good as they were, may have been a bit too much for the appetite behind the order, and thus the salads we saw were envied for the refreshment that was desired. You know how it is, who doesnt want fries with it; until youre too full for the last three bites. As for the Wild Mushroom, it too was a delight. I might also add that the bun was PERFECT on both burgers; light and airy with good texture and chew needed to keep everything together until the last bite. The beef patties were also meaty and juicy (dripping down the hand juicy - worthy of an extra napkin) with a nice char reminding us of a great summer bbq.  The toppings were generous and again fresh, especially since I am quite critical to mushroom burgers at other locations where they charge an extra 1.00 for 5 mushroom slices that taste like nothing. THIS burger came with its own mushroom mountain that tasted like they were picked, sliced and sauteed 5 minutes ago. I dont need to say much about their onion rings because if you look at others photos, you will notice consistency of complete and utter yumminess. The pictures do not lie, they redefine what an onion ring should be. And the aioli sauces . . . I am desiring to taste them all. The jalapeno dip was different enough from the bacon aioli that I could not decide which of the two I liked the best. If I had any complaint, it would have to be with the tomato garnish. This is not a complaint against Bin 4, since we are all subject to what the tomato farmers give us out of their greenhouses. Where have all the tomatoes from my childhood gone? They tasted like tomatoes! All in all, this was a delight and a gem to remember! I am glad we can still be spontaneous and still feel rewarded for the choices we make.
i will give five start burger  are so good and yummy my new favourite sangria  in bin4 plus 9pm is 50% OFF ALL BURGER free chips

50% off any burger deal after 9pm is ridiculous! I mean are ya kidding me? Were in Vancouver! Really tasty and high quality burgers at great prices (after 9 that is!). Service was great too. Highly recommend for a late night burger and drink venture. Forgive me for the photos as they dont do the meal justice.

Juicy, tasteful burger with crispy, fresh homemade chips! We ordered Wild Mushroom & The big and both were amazing. Overall great restaurant, lovely staff and cool vibe. We ll def come back to try other burgers!

I went there with a friend for the happy hour on a Sunday. It was quite at 3 pm, which is great because we wanted to chit chat and too many people and noises would have been distracting. The service was good. One of the dishes we have ordered was the roasted red pepper hummus & chips. It was I little bit dry. I prefer smooth hummus and this one was a little bit difficult to swallow. Other than that. We had a good time. One great thing, the price for the happy hour are very good.
Always a good time! Great food and welcoming staff! I recommend the Heritage Burger with fries! And the wild mushroom gravy is a must!

Great service! The manager came when my wife mentioned her food allergy and he handled it himself. Food was really good, selection of gourmet burgers was extensive! Good fries and homemade chips. I would recommend this place!

This is a great neighbourhood spot for a delicious burger and yummy salads. The food is made from fresh, high quality ingredients and you can really tell the difference! The peach mojito is awesome and great on a warm evening. The staff are super friendly and attentive and really make you feel welcome!

Brought my partner here for some Valentines Day burgers and we both really enjoyed it. All the staff were welcoming, attentive, and very friendly. Theres a strong selection of burgers. We both went for Wayu beef patti burgers and they were delicious, the right about of juiciness, good bun and fillings. The fries were tasty and the fried pickles were great! It was $44+tip for the two burgers, two fries, the fried pickles and a diet coke which was refilled. Good vibes all round. Well played Bin 4 burger lounge, well played.
Everything about this place is amazing. The price and quality are awsome. Please don t change the quality of burgers since you are the only one I really like in the town. Food

Great burger joint. We got the Bin 9 - Big Spenny and the Bin 36 - Mr.Bean and they were both delicious! The drinks were great as well! The burger I had was one of the best Ive had. I wanna go back and try the others! I got a side of fries and they were good as well, but nothing special. Skip the desert.

Great service, reasonable prices and fantastic burgers.  This is really one of a kind in Vancouver.  It is busy though (as you might expect) so plan ahead.  We love that this place is family friendly too.

Was great burgers. Excellent service. And great (although bit loud) atmosphere. Did not sit outside as there seemed to be families (who knew eachother) screaming at aleach other and laughing. Obviously beer/wine infused. I sat in the mini park for a bit before entering the restaurant. That was sad as I really wanted to sit outside on a beautiful day. Some customers are very selfish.

The burgers, red onion rings and truffle aioli were delicious. Appreciate that they have a kids menu (on an activity sheet with crayons) and the kids drink comes in a cute cup. Restaurant and washroom were very clean, good covid protocols in place. Paid parking lot nearby (around $8/2 hours). Will come back again!
This burger is so much better than White Spot  - my 8 year old daughter. Do I really need to say anything else?  Oh, they also have Hoyne beer on tap. Cherry on top, baby!

probably some of the best burgers i ve tried while visiting BC!! especially my go to after a long hard hike - i recommend the sweet corn and chipotle burger for my chicken eaters.. the unique ingredients for these burgers is what makes these so much better than any other place i ve tried!

I went there Friday with a group of friends. They have an offer for 50% discount on your burger if you order a drink (alcoholic or non alcoholic). The place is busy but the burgers are worth it. I had the Bin-14 Pre-Season Favourite, it was delicious.
The bison burger was really good, amazing combination with a jam. The bun is so soft. I would to try house made salad if you opt out of the fries, it was surprisingly really good
These guys are awesome. The drinks were perfect   their burger are simply the best.  The staffs are so nice and polite  all in all a great place
Just wow! I ve never really been to a proper burger joint in the city. Came here from a recommendation.. and there are so many burgers to pick from! The best part is that the portions are huge  .

Damn good! After 9pm the burgers are half price with the purchase of a drink. It gets busy so arrive around 8:45 so you dont end up waiting too long for a table. Also, they serve some cocktails in shareable pitchers for a reasonable price. Currently my fave burger joint in the city!
Come here after 9pm, you get a pint, burger and fries for less then 20. Burger was great, definitely coming back

Best damn burgers in Bincouver...lol! Staff were very friendly and helped us with our reservation for 10 people. We had two birthdays in the same day, and the staff made our birthday people feel special! It was our entire groups first time to Bin4 and none of us were disappointed! Will gladly return! Oh ya, those deep fried pickles were heavenly!
Wagyu beef burger was one of best burgers I have eaten at this price point. Kids loved their burgers as well (Bin 4).

Amazing food and great beer and wonderful atmosphere. I treated myself to dinner here after coming in to town on an emergency. Not only was the food top notch but the service was amazing. I will definitely be stopping back in the next time Im in the Vancouver area!

The menu is impressive - theres actually good vegetarian options besides just burgers. Service was fantastic. Vegetarian options: Surprisingly good given its a burger place. Theres a bean one and a fried tofu one, and some other things in other parts of the menu.
This is first time for me in Bin 4 Burger Lounge. The food is super fantastic, Kaity served us the best service ever. Bin 4 Burger Lounge thank you and special thanks to Kaity
reviews.response_from_owner_text: So glad you enjoyed, thank you!

reviews.review_text: Best burgers in Victoria but in Vancouver!! Always like their monthly special burgers and you can customize your burger anyway you want. When I have mine, I always take a knife and add the drip to my burger. The house ketchup is absolutely amazing. I have been to every bin 4 location except Nanaimo and the quality is always the top notch. 100% recommend to anyone how likes a good burger!

Loved the burgers here. They are a lot more unique and adventurous then the burgers you would get at other chain restaurants in the area. They have a massive selection of different types of burgers as well as a large drink menu. The fries were also very good and perfectly seasoned. They have a decent selection of veggie burgers as well. If your looking for a burger place in the area I would definitely come here.
We very like Bin 4 Burger !!! the burgers are great,the French fries & the Onion rigs as well. the Tuna salad is mmmmm... the service is so nice and heedful. we will keep come over for sure.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much!! Thank you for stopping by.

reviews.review_text: They have the BEST burgers! After 9pm your burger is $11 when you buy a beverage, but the burgers would be worth paying full price!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you, Stacey! We appreciate the awesome review :)

reviews.review_text: Wow the burgers were juicy, well seasoned, delicious, and I especially loved the buttermilk chicken! Amazing strawberry goat cheese salad!

The waitress was awesome and was very accommodating with gluten free and dairy free substitutions. The bison burger was super good, will definitely be back! Dietary restrictions: Lots of dietary substitution options

Great burger place. Prices are awesome for what you get and the burgers are probably best in town. They rotate burgers and are always trying out new combinations. This place has broadened options. When you get a side of salad instead of fries, you get a generous portion which will fill you. You also get premium sauce with your burger which is great. Would highly recommend this place to anyone!

Got the deep fried pickles and the September special burger. One of my best burgers Ive had. Tasty, burger was juicy, held together quite well. Fries and dip are very good as well! Definitely got to come back!

Had my first meal at Bin 4 today and I was not disappointed. I ordered the turkey burger with goat cheese, butter lettuce, peach jalapeno chutney, and balsamic aioli and it was amazing. The burger is served on a brioche bun (is there any other kind of bun thats an acceptable option for a gourmet burger?) with your choice of fries, a salad, or potato chips. I opted for the salad and it was flavourful with a lemon champagne honey vinaigrette, red peppers, and pumpkin seeds on a bed of artisan greens. A Blue Buck beer was a great complement to the meal. Ill definitely be back!

They have recently upped the price of late night starting at 9PM from around $10 per burger to 50% whatever burger you choose. Its fair, considering there is a huge price gap between some of the vegetarian burgers and the much-coveted bison burger. FOOD: Always delicious. I would recommend staying away from the half-and-half option for combos as the portions for each come out to be smaller than if you just got a full order of either fries or salad. I went with my friend who rarely eats salads because of venomous hatred but he actually complimented the salad, which says something. DRINK: Lots of creative drink options but no free refills. During late night, you get 50% off a burger only if you purchase a drink so Ive ordered one religiously since coming. Some, like their Raspberry Lemon Fizz, are a miss. INTERIOR: So cozy that you will be tempted to nap inside. The music and kitchen noises arent too loud, plus with the ambient lighting and plush seats and sofas you may feel your eyelids droop every time. SERVICE: Always professional and prompt :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much! We appreciate the support and the kind words :)

reviews.review_text: Bin 4 is a place to go for good burgers! There s a wide variety to choose from and they are quality burger! Been visiting this place for years and no dropping of standards or quality, every visit worth 5 stars. Ordered July feature salmon burger.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much, glad you enjoyed!

reviews.review_text: Great place! Had a Big Spenny and it tasted great. The Wagyu beef patty tasted amazing, melts in your mouth! Highly recommend this place!
very nice staff to begin with large burger menu meat was fresh awesome fries onion rings are crispy and delicous

It was my first time at Bin4 although I work a few blocks away. I was impressed with the yummy food, portions, prices and excellent service. We had a large group and our server was so efficient. Its nice to find a restaurant like this as theyre hard to find. Ill definitely be back.
Their wild mushroom burger   is just out of this world! Go with their house salad as the included side. 1st review for them but 3rd time having the shroom burger.

One of the best burger joints in town  Great selection of burgers, as well as cocktails (Id love to see more micro breweries around BC on the beer list, though!) Always clean and sleek inside. Servers were very attentive. Highly recommended!
Great burgers! Enjoyed the spiced fries as well
The after hours burger special is amazing for vancouver! 50% off burgers if you order a drink after 9, the burgers are very tasty
It was my first time here. I am a big fan of burgers and this place was great! I liked the Big Dipper with chipotle aioli dipping.

Loved that there were two types of lamb burgers on the menu! I went with the Greek style with sides of onions rings and fried pickles! Probably too many fried things for a Friday night but I couldn t resist   loved the complimentary kettle chips! Everything was delicious, can t wait to come back and try more!
